entry.title: $2300 // **RENO**AWESOME TWO BEDROOM**PRIME LOCATION**
entry.content:
**RENO**AWESOME TWO BEDROOM**PRIME LOCATION**

Listing ID #: 167370
Price: $2,300
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Floor: 1

Apartment Amenities

Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light

This a wonderful renovated two bedroom apartment in six family house. Features new hardwood floors throughout, high ceiling separate kitchen and three closets. The first bedroom will easily fit King size bed and has two oversize windows. The second bedroom could fit queen size bed with one closet and has an oversize window. The living room area is spacious features hardwood floor with a closet and has two oversize windows. Kitchen is equipped with brand new s/s appliances gas stove and refrigerator. Also features white cabinets and granite counter tops. Updated bathroom which is tiled to the ceiling.

This unit is located on 33rd street and 36th Avenue three minutes walking distance from subway!!!!

Heat and hot water is included in the rent.

For private viewing contact the Astoria expert realtor, Olga Panteli [email protected] 929-320-9228 or email [email protected]
